entries: The relic is absorbed into your body, and you transform into an elemental being of red-hot steel. You gain the effects of 7th-level {@spell elemental form} and use the statistics for the forge battle form below. In this form, you can re-shape your limbs into different objects, such as a blade or hammer, by using an {@action Interact} action. Changing your limbs in this way allows you to choose between bludgeoning, physical, or slashing damage.

items.name: Forge
entries: Speed 30 feet; fire resistance 10, weakness 5 to {@trait cold} and {@trait water}; {@b Melee} {@as 1} forgestrike, {@b Damage} {@damage 1d10} {@trait modular}; {@damage 1d4} {@condition persistent damage||persistent fire}.
